description: STRING No. 22 // From 2017-05-01 // ‘A slow bleed’ is a reflection on the despair and frustration Jensen felt in the period it was painted. A slow bleed in the business world is to be understood as a period where the stock price of a company continuously declines due to lack of trust or interest in the company.
materials: acrylic and hair spray on canvas
name: A slow bleed
